Crafting Priority

1. Item Level 83+ (T1 mods)
2. Influenced bases (Elder/Shaper)
3. 6-linked (for 2H weapons)
4. Good base type (DPS or speed)

‚Ä¢ 2H: 6L for main skill
‚Ä¢ 1H: 3L for support gems
